meta.title: Pizzafund - Financial Management App
meta.desc: Experience financial control with Pizzafund â€” your solution for effortless double-entry accounting. Tailor accounts, simplify entries, and more.

note.min: Note must contain at least 2 characters.
note.max: Note must contain at most 50 characters.
note.regex: Note must contain only spaces and alphanumeric characters.

memo.max: Memo must contain at most 50 characters.

name.min: Name must contain at least 5 characters.
name.max: Name must contain at most 50 characters.
name.regex: Name must contain only spaces and alphanumeric characters.

date.format: Date must be in the format yyyy/MM/dd.
date.range: The year must be 2018 or later.

money.regex: Amount must be in the valid number format.

entry.bothZero: Either debit or credit must be larger than zero.
entry.noneZero: Either debit or credit must be zero.
entry.imbalance: Total debit must equal to total credit.
